pages.privacy-policy: GoldLuck Casino & Hotel - Comprehensive Privacy Policy and Data Protection 18+ goldluck@gmail.com +91-832-6687272 GoldLuck Home Luxury Facilities Delights Stay and play Events Privacy Policy Additional Information We Collect and How We Use It In addition to the personal information described above, we may also collect and use the following types of information when you use our Services: Device information: We may collect information about the device you use to access our Services, such as the type of device, operating system, and unique device identifier. This information helps us to optimize our Services for your device and to provide you with a better user experience. Location information: We may collect information about your location, such as your IP address, GPS coordinates, or Wi-Fi network information. This information helps us to provide you with location-based services, such as showing you nearby attractions or restaurants. Cookies and other tracking technologies: We may use cookies and other tracking technologies, such as web beacons and pixels, to collect information about your use of our Services. This information helps us to analyze trends, administer our Services, and provide you with targeted advertising. You can control the use of cookies through your browser settings, but please note that disabling cookies may affect your ability to use some features of our Services. Third-party plugins and integrations: Our Services may contain plugins or integrations from third-party platforms, such as social media networks, video sharing sites, or payment processors. These third-party platforms may collect information about your use of our Services, even if you do not interact with their plugins or integrations. We recommend that you review the privacy policies of these third-party platforms to understand how they collect, use, and disclose your information. Children's Privacy Our Services are not intended for children under the age of 18, and we do not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 18. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under the age of 18, we will take steps to delete such information from our records. If you believe that we have collected personal information from a child under the age of 18, please contact us at goldluck@gmail.com. Data Retention We will retain your personal information for as long as necessary to provide you with our Services, to comply with our legal obligations, and to resolve disputes. The criteria used to determine the retention periods include the nature of the data, the purpose for which it was collected, and the applicable legal requirements. After the retention period expires, we will securely delete or anonymize your personal information. To exercise these choices or rights, please contact us at goldluck@gmail.com.
